name: galdomedia
overview:
The firm GaldoMedia came into being in July 2007 in PoznaÅ„, Poland. GaldoMedia specialises in creating and projecting web pages, internet applications and computer systems (e.g. CMS, internet shops, systems of circulation of documents, CRM, applications of financial accounts, e-Commerce).

Foremost GaldoMedia deal in:

  • Projecting CMS services , auction and social portals, web applications and the internet travel-agencies
  • Creating internet portals
  • Attendance of web software under the angle of its security
  • Advising in positioning the web pages and the leadership of the AdWords campaign
  • Visual identification and advising in the range of the promotion of firms in Internet.
